about_the_game:
Grow. Adapt. Symbiotize.

Welcome to the vibrant, microscopic world of Animacules – a 2D side-view microbial "City" Builder and Simulation game where you master the art of symbiosis and adaptability.

Innovative Colony Management

  • Cultivate a thriving colony by growing diverse plants and organisms on any solid surface.

  • Start with basic Stem Cells that eat, grow, divide, or wither based on the food available. Differentiate them into new organisms and meet their needs to expand your colony.

  • Gather and manage essential resources, like protein, mineral, or DNA, or trade them if not locally available. Balance resource management and growth.

Strategic Gameplay: Explore Unique Biomes

  • Navigate a world map filled with distinct biomes like the Salt Barrens, Caves, Fungal Biome, Mineralized Biome, and Hydrothermal Biome, each presenting unique challenges and strategic resources.

  • Adapt to the specific conditions of each biome, from the chill experience of the Lush Biome to the toxic threats in the Fungal Biome.

  • Interact with foreign organisms through appeasing or antagonizing approaches, affecting their stance and your colony's strategy. Are they a threat to eliminate or an ally to trade with?

Chill Vibes and Colorful Visuals with Progression and Replayability

  • Enter a beautiful alien world with vibrant, biology-inspired visuals.

  • Pursue multiple paths to success, whether through peaceful symbiosis or aggressive expansion.

Demo Highlights (COMING SOON!):

  • The demo offers ~2 hours of gameplay, introducing the core concepts of Animacules.

  • Dive into a series of guided tutorial levels to learn the basics.

  • Care for your tiny inhabitants: cultivate 19 unique plants and 5 mobile cells, explore your surroundings, gather resources, and manage production.

  • Tackle an open demo scenario with increasingly challenging objectives. How big and vibrant can your colony become?

Road map:

The demo is not feature-complete. Here's a glimpse of what's coming in the full game.

  • More creatures, more colors, more variety!

  • World map with game progression: Build colonies in different biomes, each offering unique strategic resources. Complete goals in each colony to unlock new organisms and game mechanics, allowing for better colonies and more complex strategies.

  • Trade: Establish resource-specialized colonies and later import those resources to cultivate increasingly powerful colonies.

  • Colony defense: Protect your creations from invading organisms and spreading viruses. Trace threats back to their source and eliminate them.

  • Creature evolution: Mutate and adapt your organisms to thrive in diverse environments. Use your upgraded organisms to tackle new, more challenging goals.

  • Semi-procedural biomes: Explore a large selection of hand-crafted terrains, dynamically populated with goodies and challenges, offering a fresh experience with every replay.

Ready to dive deeper? Wishlist the full game to stay updated and experience Animacules in its entirety!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU, 1024MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Manage a colony of microbes. Explore diverse biomes and navigate complex ecosystems. Evolve and adapt to ensure the survival and growth of your tiny inhabitants. Will your colony thrive?
